description:
It's a sunny day over here in Northern California, and when there's nice weather and a bunch of porn stars roaming around, you're sure to see some action!

For example, we spotted Mason taking a cruise out into the garden, so we decided to follow him. And what did we see? Well, the hung hunk getting naked in the sun and stroking his fat cock, that's what!

Enjoy!
title: Sun & Cum
